sentences.en: A kind of cutter undercarriage mechanism used in cutting machine is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍一种在卷筒放卷和收卷的切割分切机器中的进刀与退刀机构.

sentences.en: First, a random generalized Cookie - Cutter set K _ T on [ 0 , T ] is constructed.
sentences.cn: 我们首先在构造随机广义Cookie -Cutter 集的过程中,通过记忆函数,研究了这种随机概率测度序列的紧测度的收敛性.

sentences.en: Handmade goods appeal to those who are tired of cookie-cutter products.
sentences.cn: 手工制品受到那些已厌倦划一产品的人的欢迎。

sentences.en: He departed at a brisk gallop, but on the way met Gethings and Cutter returning.
sentences.cn: 他轻快地飞跑而去, 可是跑到半路上,就碰见葛星斯和克特在赶回来了.

sentences.en: He has been using every opportunity to boost his credibility as a budget cutter.
sentences.cn: 他一有机会就吹嘘自己削减预算的能力。

sentences.en: Mr Robinson has developed the reputation of a ruthless cost-cutter.
sentences.cn: 大家都知道鲁宾逊先生在降低成本上毫不手软。

sentences.en: Shallow cone crown profile pilot bit , reaming by reamerwing, heavy cutter density.
sentences.cn: 浅锥型冠部领眼, 侧翼扩眼,布齿密度加强.

sentences.en: The coastguard cutter cruised along the coast looking for smugglers.
sentences.cn: 水上警察缉私船沿海巡逻搜寻走私犯.

sentences.en: The curve - edged hobbing cutter is used in producing rectangular wing sanitary napkin.
sentences.cn: 曲线刃滚切刀是用来加工护翼卫生巾的专用刀具.

sentences.en: The cutter can be mounted like a pennib in a simple holder.
sentences.cn: 刻刀可象绘图笔一样,固定在简易的刀架上.

sentences.en: The light beam can be steered more accurately than a mechanical cutter.
sentences.cn: 这种光束比机械切削器能运转得更为精确.

sentences.en: The shrill ringing of a bell broke up the card game on the cutter.
sentences.cn: 刺耳的铃声打散了小汽艇的牌局.

sentences.en: The wood - cutter bunched his wood up.
The wood - cutter is busy bunching.
What had Cutter done to make him stick out from the crowd?
sentences.cn: 卡特做了些什么，让他从众人之中脱颖而出？

trans.tran_cn: 切削者，切割机，独桅纵帆船，小艇，小型武装快艇，轻便雪橇
trans.tran_en: a tool that is used for cutting something
